segments.text: I just wanna tell you how I'm feeling Gotta make you understand Never gonna give you up Never gonna let you down Never gonna run around and desert you Never gonna make you cry Never gonna say goodbye
Don't tell me you're too glad to see Never gonna give you up Never gonna let you down Never gonna run around and desert you Never gonna make you cry
Never gonna make you cry Never gonna say goodbye

Inside we both know what's been going on We know the game and we're gonna play it I just wanna tell you how I'm feeling Gotta make you understand Never gonna give you up Never gonna let you down Never gonna run around and desert you Never gonna make you cry Never gonna say goodbye

full_text: I just wanna tell you how I'm feeling Gotta make you understand Never gonna give you up Never gonna let you down Never gonna run around and desert you Never gonna make you cry Never gonna say goodbye Don't tell me you're too glad to see Never gonna give you up Never gonna let you down Never gonna run around and desert you Never gonna make you cry Never gonna make you cry Never gonna say goodbye Inside we both know what's been going on We know the game and we're gonna play it I just wanna tell you how I'm feeling Gotta make you understand Never gonna give you up Never gonna let you down Never gonna run around and desert you Never gonna make you cry Never gonna say goodbye ♪ Please tell me why ♪
